get.description: This method gets all the operations that are exposed for customer.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

items.title: REST API Operation
items.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

post.summary: API for updating inventory metadata and inventory configuration

parameters.name: familyIdentifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the product family

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the device

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: manageInventoryMetadataRequest
parameters.description: Updates inventory metadata and inventory configuration

202.description: "Request is accepted to manage inventory metadata"

post.summary: API for linking management resource with inventory

parameters.name: familyIdentifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the product family

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the device

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: manageLinkRequest
parameters.description: Links the management resource to the inventory

managementResourceArmId.description:
Arm Id of the management resource to which inventory is to be linked
For unlink operation, enter empty string

operation.description: Operation to be performed - Link, Unlink, Relink

tenantId.description: Tenant ID of management resource associated with inventory

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: searchInventoriesRequest
parameters.description: Searches inventories with the given filters and returns in the form of a list

schema.description: Represents the list of partner inventories

orderItemType.description: Order item type - purchase or rental

configurationIdentifierOnDevice.description:
Configuration identifier on device - this is used in case of any mismatch
between actual configuration on inventory and configuration stored in service

managementResource.description: Represents management resource data associated with inventory.

armId.description: Arm ID of management resource associated with inventory

tenantId.description: Tenant ID of management resource associated with inventory

registrationAllowed.description: Boolean flag to indicate if registration is allowed

orderItem.description: Represents additional details about the order item

values.description: A device has been prepared for the order.
Device has been picked up from user and in transit to Azure datacenter.
Device has been received at Azure datacenter from the user.
Data copy from the device at Azure datacenter.
Device is ready to be handed to customer from Azure DC.
Device can be dropped off at Azure DC.
Currently in draft mode and can still be cancelled
Order is currently in draft mode and can still be cancelled
Order is in transit to customer
Order is in use at customer site
